# SignalHaus Website ‚Äî Code Quality Audit

*Generated by Judge Agent v2 ‚Äî 2026-02-27*

---

## üî¥ Critical Issues

### 1. Contact Form Has No Backend
**File:** `src/app/contact/page.tsx`
**Issue:** The form `onSubmit` handler just calls `e.preventDefault()` and sets `setSubmitted(true)`. No data is ever sent anywhere. Every lead who fills this form is silently dropped.
```tsx
onSubmit={(e) => {
  e.preventDefault();
  setSubmitted(true);  // ‚Üê FAKE! No API call, no email sent
}}
```
**Fix:** Add `POST /api/contact` route using Resend or post to Formspree endpoint.

### 2. Contact Page Metadata Pattern is Broken
**File:** `src/app/contact/page.tsx`
**Issue:** File uses `"use client"` (required for useState) but tries to set metadata via raw `<head>` JSX tags. Next.js App Router ignores this ‚Äî the page will have no proper metadata in production.
```tsx
"use client";
import type { Metadata } from "next"; // ‚Üê imported but never used
// ...
<head>  {/* ‚Üê This doesn't work correctly in App Router */}
  <title>Contact | SignalHaus</title>
```
**Fix:** Create `src/app/contact/metadata.ts` exporting the metadata object and `src/app/contact/ContactForm.tsx` as the client component. Keep `page.tsx` as a server component.

---

## üü° Medium Issues

### 3. Unused Import
**File:** `src/app/contact/page.tsx` line 2
```tsx
import type { Metadata } from "next"; // ‚Üê imported but not used (commented out)
```
**Fix:** Remove the import.

### 4. No Image Optimization
**File:** `src/app/layout.tsx` (OG image), various pages
**Issue:** OG image referenced as plain string `/og-image.png`. While this works, Next.js `Image` component should be used for any `<img>` tags for automatic optimization.
**Status:** No `<img>` tags found directly, but OG images aren't optimized through Next.js.

### 5. Hardcoded Canonical URLs
**Files:** `src/app/pricing/page.tsx`, `src/app/contact/page.tsx`
**Issue:** Canonical URLs hardcoded as `https://www.signalhaus.ai/...`. If domain changes or during staging, these will be wrong.
**Fix:** Use `NEXT_PUBLIC_BASE_URL` environment variable.

### 6. No Error Handling in Form
**File:** `src/app/contact/page.tsx`
**Issue:** When real API is added, there's no error state UI to show users if submission fails.
**Fix:** Add `error` state and display error message.

---

## üü¢ Low / Info Issues

### 7. No Tests
**Status:** Zero test files anywhere in the project.
**Missing:**
- Unit tests for any utility functions
- E2E tests for form submission flow
- Visual regression tests

### 8. No Linting Configuration
**Issue:** No `.eslintrc` or ESLint config file. `package.json` has no lint script.
**Fix:** Add `next lint` to scripts, create `.eslintrc.json` with Next.js recommended rules.

### 9. No .env.example File
**Issue:** No `.env.example` for documenting future environment variables (Resend API key, analytics ID, etc.).
**Fix:** Create `.env.example` with placeholders.

### 10. Badge Section Uses Placeholder Data
**File:** `src/app/page.tsx`
**Issue:** Badges (Harvard Alumni, WEF, AWS, etc.) are rendered as styled text divs. Should eventually be real badge images/logos for credibility.

### 11. Blog Has Only 1 Post
**File:** `src/app/blog/page.tsx`
**Issue:** Hardcoded blog post list with 1 entry. No CMS, no MDX pipeline.
**Recommendation:** Either add MDX-based blog or integrate Contentlayer/Sanity for content management.
